mean_cn: adj. 不必要的，不需要的，多余的
mean_en: not needed; more than is needed; (of remarks, etc.) not needed in the situation and likely to be offensive
sentence: It's unnecessary to take so many clothes on a short trip.
sentence_trans: 短途旅行不必带那么多衣服。
word_etyma: un不 + necess必要 + ary 表示有……性质的 → unnecessary不必要的，无用的
